about_the_game:
Welcome to Expedition Wildlife! Experience the wonders of the animal kingdom. As a newcomer to Wildlife, you are greeted by the landowner, Mr. Chewer. He offers you a job: managing Seren Valley and helping its residents solve their problems. As you travel through the land, you are confronted with the harsh realities of poaching, melting ice caps, and deforestation. Can you uncover the hidden force behind these crises and restore balance? Prove yourself and become the new, righteous landowner of Wildlife!

Characteristics

* Unique playable characters such as Jari, Indi and Rico with each different playstyle.

* Discover the open world in the cheerful colorful wildlife full of adventure.
* Help Mr. Chewer to expel the evil from Wildlands.
* Test your skills in challenging levels and boss battles.
* Enrich your knowledge about animals in a fun educative way.

name: Expedition Wildlife

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-610
  • Memory: 8 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Ti

short_description: Witness nature's majesty, where the landowner Mr. Chewer introduces you to Wildlife. Here, a crucial mission awaits: challenge the poaching, deforestation, and melting ice caps. Unravel the mystery force threatening this paradise. Can you restore harmony and ascend as the landowner of Wildlife?
